reviews.comments: Práctico y bien ubicado. Jony estuvo siempre disponible a la hora de responder a nuestras consultas, incluso pudiendo organizarnos para hacer el check in un poco antes.

Muy buen departamento...con todo lo necesario para estadias cortas o largas.
Ubicación inmejorable
Muy muy recomendable. Excelente tamaño, distribución y equipamiento. Moderno y limpio. En pleno Palermo, cerca de bares restaurantes. Jony  excelente anfitrión.
Todo genial. Esperamos volver pronto.
Una excelente ubicacion para un departamento nuevo. Tener un poco mas de cuidado con los temas de pintura y detalles en el departamento
Todo excelente y jony excelente anfitrión

El departamento es muy cómodo,  limpio, y agradable. La zona es muy kinda, tranquila pero cerca de zonas comerciales, restaurants y bares. Tambien es comodo para acceder al transporte publico. Todo perfecto con los anfitriones.

Me sentí muy cómoda en el departamento,  los detalles en la decoración,  un buen colchón,  poder escuchar música,  etc ...  estaba impecable cuando llegue y es tal cual como se vé en las fotos,  la zona tranquila,  linda...  El subte a unas 4 cuadras y lugares para comer y salir a pasear  cerca.  La persona que  me recibió muy atenta,  relajada...  Ningún problema,  todo super bien... 100% recomendable.

Súper recomendado el loft!!! Esta muy lindo, limpio, bien ubicado y nos sentimos como en nuestra casa!!!es todo como se muestra en las fotos y en lo escrito.. Jony dejo un folleto como guía con direcciones o teléfonos que son útiles.. Karina la encargada nos trató super bien! Para volver la verdad!! Saludos
Excelente lugar, tal como sale en las fotos, muy comodo, bonita vista y por un precio muy accesible

Muy bien lo que se ve en el anuncio ni mas ni menos . Muy buena atención x parte de los propietarios .
Unicos inconvenientes no pudimos hacer andar el wifi y la puerta del baño no cerraba .

Buena atención para los huéspedes.
Se respetó todo lo acordado.
El apartamento es luminoso y espacioso. La ubicación es perfecta para estar cerca del centro y con medios de transporte a mano, dentro de un barrio tranquilo.
Jony aportó buena información con datos locales muy útiles.

Es la segunda vez que me quedo en el alojamiento de Jony, como siempre la zona es perfecta si uno quiere descansar sin ruido. El barrio lo tiene todo, seguridad, tranquilidad y muchos sitios para ir, el Subte esta cerquisima y el transporte en BsAs es tan bueno que puedes llegar a cualquier lado rapidamente. El departamento es amplio, silencioso y puedes descansar placidamente. La gente es super amable, incluyendo a los vecinos de piso. Karina y su esposo los encargados fueron super amables conmigo en todo momento. Volveria nuevamente a alojarme aqui.

La ubicación del inmueble es excelente, bueno para caminar por palermo que me encanta, da para hacer todo a pie! El apto es tal como se describe! me gustó mucho!
Jony lo arregló todo para que tuviera una gran estancia, poniendo a disposición una persona para eso.
Depto muy bien ubicado , no ruidoso , comodo y buen Wi-Fi .....
Todo muy bien, muy central y comodo.
El apartamento es muy céntrico, cómodo en una zona muy bonita de Buenos Aires. Tiene buen internet, cable. Cama muy cómoda. El baño se moja después de una ducha.
Jony fue muy buen anfitrión. El apartamento era tal cual figuraba en las fotografías y descripciones. Muy recomendable.

Muy lindo y cómodo. La pasamos genial en el dpto, buena ubicación, linda decoración y espacialidad junto con una vista despejada hacia la ciudad. El piso alto y la doble altura hacen que sea muy confortable y luminoso, lo tendré muy en cuenta en mi próximo viaje! Jony muy buen anfitrión, saludos!
Todo muy bien, departamento súper amplio y bien ubicado. Buena estadía en general :)
Muy cómodo departamento, tiene todo lo que se necesita como guarida para conocer lo hermoso que es buenos aires
Sï, la descripción del anuncio era correcta y el barrio estaba bueno. El departamento es muy lindo.
Hermoso departamento!!! La atencion de maravilla!!! Cuando tenga la oportunidad mas que seguro volveriamos!! Muchisimas gracias!!!

El departamento es tal cual lo vemos en las fotos. El plus es la tranquilidad y paz que otorga despues de un dia agotador. Un clima de paz alucinante. El espacio estuvo limpio pulcro. No conoci a Jony pero dejo todo encargado para que me sintiera en casa. Aldo y Karina los encargados muy amables para cuanto requiriese. Lo maximo, volveria nuevamente a BsAs y a este hermoso lugar.

El apto de Jony es tal cual se describe en las fotos, muy bien ubicado, y con muy buena atención. Ellos tienen guías prácticas para sus huéspedes y están atentos a cualquier solicitud. Es una muy buena opción en Buenos Aires.
Ha sido muy bueno estar en Palermo y todavia más por haber estado tan bien hospedada. El departamento de Jony es exatamente lo que se propone, me ha encantado todo!
Todo excelente! El loft es exactamente como en las fotos. Muy cerca de los mejores bares y restaurantes de buenos aires.

Mi novio y yo tuvimos una excelente estadía en el apartamento de Jony. Las cosas empezaron bien desde antes: Jony siempre estuvo dispuesto a ayudarnos y contestar nuestras preguntas de manera rápida y eficiente. Estuvo pendiente de que nuestra llegada y salida pasaran de la mejor manera y sin complicaciones. Elaboró una pequeña guía de recomendaciones del barrio que nos fue muy útil. Además el apartamento cumplió con todas nuestras expectativas. Luminoso, amplio, nos sentimos en casa. El internet funciona perfectamente. La ubicación es insuperable, cerca de restaurantes, de fácil acceso en bus o en metro. Muy, muy recomendado. Quedamos con ganas de volver para seguir disfrutando todo lo que Buenos Aires tiene para ofrecer.

El apartamento es precioso y tiene todo lo que uno necesita para pasarla bien. No conocimos a Jony, pero nos atendió la conserje y fue muy amable. Sin lugar a dudas un apartamento para recomendar, bien equipado y cercano a todo, vas a Plaza Serrano caminando y también a Santa Fé, quedamos super conformes y seguramente volvamos pronto.

El studio es exactamente como se ve en las fotos. Estuvimos 8 días alojados allá sin problemas. Está perfectamente ubicado en Palermo muy cerca de transportes públicos y de zonas de ocio del barrio. Es bastante tranquilo y luminoso. Algunos días un poco de ruido en la terraza de arriba que supongo que es comunitaria y tendría a niños jugando. Está equipado con todo lo que se necesita para unos días en Buenos Aires. Buena  y rápida comunicación con los anfitriones y no hubo problemas ni el en check in o check out. El baño con poca ventilación. Por lo demás todo perfecto.

salio todo perfecto , es ,mi primera experiencia en la web. 
todo es tal cual como esta en el perfil del apartamento. 
Jony es excelente anfitrion . 
muy bien la ubicacion seguridad , orden y limpieza. 
Muchas Gracias. Adri.

He estado alojada en el departamento de Jony durante 20 días. El piso es comodo, confortable y lindo. Esta muy ubicado, quedando cerca supermercados, restaurantes y zonas de ocio. Asimimso, el departamento queda ubicado a escasas cuadras de la avenida santa fe por lo que agarrar un colectivo o el subte es sencillisimo. el trato personal tanto de Jony como de  Valeria ha sido extraordinario, siempre atentos a satisfacer las necesidades de alguien que, como en mi caso, era nueva tanto en el uso de esta pagina como en mi visita a Buenos Aires. sin duda alguna recomiendo el alquiler del piso, yo esoty segura de que volvere.

Que buena experiencia !!! El departamento es increible, muy lindo, muy limpio, funcional y muy bien ubicado en el barrio de Palermo (muy cerca de las plazas de Soho y del metro). Nuestra relacion con Jony y Valeria era muy buena asi que todo nos salio perfecto.
Ademàs, Jony nos dejo muy buenas direcciones para disfrutar de Buenos Aires y sus alrededores (restaurantes, bares, museos y ferias).
Recomando este departamento por cierto. Seguro que volveremos algun dia para disfrutar de este duplex y de esa magica ciudad.
Gracias por todo.
Es un bonito apartamento, en una excelente ubicación y con un anfitrión educado y amable. Vale mucho la pena pasarse por ahí!
Excelente loft, ubicado cerca del mejor sector en Palermo Soho, un lujo.100% recomendable.

Jony's place is very well located near Palermo Soho, and although it's near a bigger street, it's actually very quiet!

Jony's super communicative, and check in and check out were smooth. The carpet in the second floor was not great for someone with allergies, like myself, but beyond that, the apartment was good and had all the amenities needed for a short stay.

Jony is a fantastic host.  On a proactive basis did everything he could to make my stay enjoyable.  Jony would reply my emails/messages often within an hour and made sure all was on order.  The neighborhood is one of the best in Buenos Aires, at a walking distance from many and nice cafes and restaurants, and close to the subway.  The super of the building was also very attentive and the place is very safe.
Great spot in the heart of Palermo. Cool apartment with great views, comfy bed, and a personal guide book of things to do and see. Would definitely recommend. Thanks Jony!

Jony’s place was in a great location that was quiet but also very close to the restaurants and shops that make Palermo so great! Jony was a wonderful host and we were super grateful that he let us use the apartment until we left for the airport later in the day. Highly recommend

The beautiful two-level loft in Palermo is located within walking distance to public transportation, restaurants, and activities. Jony was a responsive and accommodating host, and I appreciated his flexibility during checkout.
Amazing time at jonys beautiful home! Clean, great location, and smooth check in/communication. He even left us a nice guide :)
Great place to stay!

Jony’s apartment is beautiful and in the best location.  It’s easy to walk many places in BA and the restaurants and bars in his neighborhood are great.

Jony was very responsive as well!  Highly recommend.
I would recommend jony’s place in Palermo as it is in a great location and is a lovely apartment
Great stylish place in a great location. Very good communication and very easy checking in and out. Highly recommended!
Great location and stylish loft. Highly recommended!

The place is in a very nice location in Palermo, nearby nice places to eat and see. The apartment has a good size and it is confortable if you are looking to walk around the city and stay in a place of your own. It was easy to communicate with Jony, who was always available, and it was also easy to make the necessary arrangements for our arrival and departure.

The location, convenience and communication makes this a great place to stay in Buenos Aires.  Jony was easy to communicate with and very responsive.  We would gladly stay here again on our next visit.
The apartment is a truly amazing place, and couldn't be located at a more convenient location. Great if you want to explore Buenos Aires, both during the day and at night. Highly recommended!

Jony and Valeria are excellent hosts. They are flexible and having Karina(the janitor) on site is great. 
The flat is modern and light and well equipped.
Great location, great apartment. He provided lots of helpful advice about the area and always responded quickly when I messaged him about anything. Perfect experience.

Great apartment in a nice, quiet location.  Close to shopping, restaurants and the lovely Bosques de Palermo.  Top floor, with elevator, in a secure building.  Cute little balcony and nice loft sleeping area.

The location of the apartment is great, near to restaurants, supermarkets, and Palermo Soho. Jony was very helpful since the beginning and gave us a lot of information about the apartment and the neighborhood. When we had a wifi issue, it was solved very quickly.
Matched the description well. Jony was a very helpful host. I found the apartment a little humid/damp, but that could have just been from the weather in Buenos Aires.

Perfect location and Jony was responsive and accommodating. The apartment itself is spacious and modern with a nice balcony in a quiet/relaxed building. It's walking distance to many restaurants, bars, and clubs. We stayed here 8 nights and enjoyed every minute of it.
O espaço é exatamente como descreve a foto, a calefação é ótima e o apartamento perto de tudo que você possa precisar.
I had a wonderful stay in Jony's apartment. He is very responsive if you have questions was a friendly host. My only regret that I couldn't stay longer.

We had a great time in Jony´s flat. The location is fantastic, really close to the bars and restaurants but on a quiet street. The flat is nice although it´s a bit dated. The bed is comfortable and the sheets are nice and clean, but the bathroom is pretty old and the sofa downstairs is quite bad. The kitchen is good enough for a simple breakfast, but not enough for cooking your own meals, since the selection of pans and tools is pretty limited. The views are fantastic and the structure of the flat is cool. In summary: good experience, comfy bed, but there are a few things that could use a refurbishment.
Apartamento excelente, exatamente como nas fotos! Está próximo das principais atrações e ótimos restaurantes do bairro. Posso também destacar a atenção e presteza do anfitrião sempre que solicitadas.

This may be the nicest apartment I've rented across my travels. I would happily call this place a home if I lived in BA. Jony and Karina are excellent hosts - very available and easy to communicate with. It's a special apartment, located in the lovely Palermo Soho.

Wonderful and cozy studio! 
Nice and warm bath, hot water to wash the dishes, fast check in, very well located. 
Totally recommend!

I stayed in this apartment for twelve days, and found it quite pleasant. The area Palermo Soho is THE area to stay in Buenos Aires, central, safe, lots and lots of nice boutique stores and restaurants, cafes and nightlife. The apartment is really quiet at night, daytime you can hear the usual sounds from a residential building; a door slamming, someone talking in the corridor, a dog barking outside - but nothing that lasts more than a few seconds. I did not meet the hosts, but they called the minute I stepped inside and offered to show me around and bring me to good places to eat, I found that very nice. They had made their own guide book which I found very useful - wish other hosts could be that professional.
The WiFi was good, the TV I never watched so cannot tell, but there was also a sound system which I let run most of the time. The apartment is on the 8th and 9th floor away from the street, with a nice view and a good balcony. There is no sun on the balcony, but there is a terrace on the roof where you can have a tan if you so wish.
The furniture was simple, maybe even a bit outdated but I still say this is a nice place. It has everything you need, and the location is unbeatable. Enjoy your stay!

Jony's place is a real gem! Clean, beautiful and right in the middle of Bs As main suburbs. Easy access to transports, cafes, restaurants. Jony and his wife were incredibly helpful in making aure my stay was worry-free. 

Would definitely stay here again and recommend to others!
Très bien de tout point de vue

nice stay
very good Host communication
good value/price ratio
WIFI could be improved

Fantastic location and professional communication. Really appreciated the flexibility during checkout. The apartment represents a great value for the area with an incredible loft style architecture. While the apartment is reasonably priced, it felt too bare bones and could be made more homely. Overall I enjoyed my stay!

a truly great apartment, with a perfect wonderful view from over the city. it has a good atmosphere, is in a great area, walking distance to the all the great restaurants and bars, but quiet around the house. you will love it and I would love to come again! thank you very much!
tres agréable séjour. Appartement calme et lumineux. quartier central. Nous reviendrons
Jony's place is just like the pictures. I didn't get to meet Jony, but the service was great, wifi was great, location was awesome. I am going to stay here when I return.

My wife and I recently visited Buenos Aires for the first time last month. We were looking for something centrally located and within walking distance to great restaurants, shopping and activities. Jony's place was in the perfect location. Jony also provided us a guide to BA that he created upon booking his place. You can definitely tell he's willing to go above and beyond for his guests. On our last day we had an overnight flight and needed to checkout early. However, instead of carrying our luggage everywhere with us that day he kindly offered to store it for us downstairs. Overall we were very pleased with our experience and would recommend this place to others.
I really like the place. The studio is overlooking Buenos Aires Palermo, you have a balcony and its located near to the best restaurants and hippest streets of Buenos Aires (walking distance)

great space with good amenities, good communication, great location, secure building, comfortable space and walking distance to all the great tourists spots in buenos aires. Additional sheets and towels would have been helpful, we ran out of toilet paper and we bought some ourselves at the super nearby. great spot to feel like a local. super recommended

Jony's two level loft in Palermo Soho is a perfect location, for whatever you choose to experience. It's very close to all public transportation, and I loved being able to go get fresh made empanadas, or roasted chicken, pizza, great steaks, all within a few block area.  The little markets are perfect for stocking up and basing yourself at Jony's.

The apt has a great city-line view, and they light was beautiful in the evenings.  As far as the basics, there's a strong, hot shower, a good bed (with views!) and the WiFi was terrific. Instant, with no glitches.

Karina and Aldo were great contacts and very helpful and kind with matters having to do with the building. Unfortunately I didn't meet Jony, but he's professional, responsive, and honest, and everything was smooth sailing with the arrangements.

How much did I like staying there? Well, I stayed a week, then went up to Iguazu for four days, then came back and stayed another week in Jony's place! And I'm glad I picked it. The Palermo Soho neighborhood is hip, fun, busy in the right ways, and full of lovely, helpful people. 

I would gladly stay in Jony's place in Buenos Aires again, and I may be doing that!  The price, location, and amenities were exactly what I was looking for!

Really loved this place! The whole organization & communcation was really easy, the apartment is very quiet, the location superb, the view great and the bed comfortable! So the place really has everything you need and the price is really fair. Will be back!

This is a nice apartment, fully furnished including kitchen.  It is in a great area of Palermo, within walking distance of many good mercados, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, and a fitness center.  It is within a few blocks of the subte, and an extended walk to the Rose Garden and park area.  Jony and his people were great hosts, helpful whenever required, and the checkin/checkout was easy and smooth.
ive stayed in this apartment several times before and i still love it!

O apartamento é exatamente igual as fotos. A localização é excelente próximo a mercados, restaurantes, etc.. Jony foi muito flexível com nosso check in pois nosso vôo atrasou bastante. Certamente ficaria lá novamente.

The loft was great. Perfectly located in the heart of Palermo Soho, near a bunch of cafes, restaurants, and bars; yet on a quiet corner.

The apartment itself was comfortable and well equipped. Although I didn't meet Jony personally, he was available and quick to reply.

Definitely worth coming back :)
Sehr coole Unterkunft inmitten von Palermo. Man kommt überall schnell hin und hat gute Anbindungen an öffentliche Verkehrsmittel. Restaurants und Bars hat man auch um die Ecke. Sehr empfehlenswert!

We had a great time in Buenos Aires. Jony is such a nice host, all his recomendations are great and very helpfully. Jony answered very quickly and had an answear for any question.
The apartment is realy nice and for two it is enough space. The location is good, it is very near to a lot of restraunts and bar's. We enjoyed our stay here and would love to come back once.

I absolutely loved Jonys apartment.
Bed is very comfortable. 

Location is amazing. Close to everything. Shopping, food and banks! 

I love walking, and walking to recoleta and other attractions could be done in 45 mins. 

Very safe neighbourhood. Could easily walk around at night and not feel uneasy. And the neighbors are very friendly and helpful.

Jony is outstanding host. Greeted me on arrival, very friendly and welcoming. He responds quickly to questions and when I was stuck with exchanging money, he pointed me in the right direction. 

DEFINATELY RECOMMEND THIS APARTMENT 100%
Nice Place, Nice Location. The staff is a older than u can see in the photos. But, nice place.
Jony is a very good host! Very attentive. The apartment is amazing, clean and maintained. the neighborhood is awesome.
Really cool apartment, great location and a well organized host. Although I didn't meet Jony in person everything went well. I would definitely come back!

Jony was a very helpful host. Answered all our questions & check in/out was easy. The apartment is as described - no big surprises. Wifi worked great, bed was comfy, everything functioned as it should. The neighborhood was fun to explore.. overall we had a great time. Thanks Jony!
The whole experience was very seamless and Jony's responsiveness was impeccable. The apartment was clean, bed was comfortable, wifi was fast, and the location was perfect. Thanks for a great stay!
Second time in Buenos Aires with my boyfriend and we were greeted right away and the apartment was great in an awesome location.

Had a great stay at Jony's cool apartement. 8th floor, authentic view, very spacey und bright and, although in the middle ov everything, pretty quiet because it's away from the street. Didn't meet Jony in person but hat a very good conversation with him online, he was very attentive and offered help in any way. Would definitely book this place again.

We really loved this apartment. It was very spacious and inviting. The bed was also quite comfortable. There are a lot of restaurants and shops nearby. Communication with Jony was also very good. Overall very nice experience.
Everything is good. Jony provide many valuable information for the tourist and he is very kind in helping us.
Very nice and clean apartment. The host was very helpful and responsive. We got to check in a bit earlier and he helped us book a cab. Great location!We were very pleased with our stay.
our stay at jony's was a great as it was the 2times we stayed there before. everything is as described. the place was clean and cozy.
Great location and as described. Jony was also extremely responsive and accommodating. Highly recommended!

My wife and I spent 6 nights here in Jan 2016. The apartment served our purposes well with it's great location within walking distance to Palermo and easy access to public transportation. Jony provided us a nice pamphlet in English with a lot of recommendations and good information, the most valuable of which was the Moovit app the made getting around on the buses easy. The apt has a cool layout and a very comfortable bed.  I recommend the place as a good affordable option.

Great apartment for solo budget-conscious traveler! 
Apartment was clean and comfortable. I didn't end up using the kitchen much but everything you could need to self cater was available, with a big fridge.
Comfy bed, clean if basic bathroom.
Great location in Palermo, close to shops and the subte.
Jony was attentive, informative and flexible. All the information i could need about local facilities and restaurants, and everything i needed to know about the apartment was provided.
I had a great time staying in Jony's apartment and would recommend it to anyone!

Very smooth stay in a nice apartment in what is for sure one of the most exciting neigbourhoods of Buenoas Aires - Palermo. Although we didnt meet Jony in person we had good contact through the app and the concierge of the building helped out with all practicalities. Good information as well on restaurants, bars etc available as well. Recommended!

The apartment was fantastic. Great location, very walkable to the Palermo restaurants and shopping but not in the thick of the tourist hub. Loved the open plan two-floor loft layout. Tons of light and great view from the balcony.  Highly recommended!

Jony's place served us well. Nice space. Good location--especially if you prefer a less dense neighborhood than Retiro or Recoleta. Jony himself was incredibly generous with his time and advice before and during our trip. We can't thank him enough for that!
Really nice flat and a very helpful host. We will definitely stay here again if we're back in BA!

Great apartment in the heart of Palermo Soho. Close to grocery stores, butcher, deli and many great restaurants. We used Jony's BA guide for our meals out and they were excellent recommendations. Really enjoyed sitting on the balcony and taking in the view and atmosphere. 

Access and departing was easy even though we never personally met Jony himself but was only a quick email away.

Muchas gracias!
